title: Sum function
description: Write a function to sum two numbers.

codeTask.prompt:
Write a function `sum(a, b)` that returns their sum.
Example Input: `sum(3, 5)`
Expected Output: `8`

options: Method belongs to the class, not instances
questions.correctAnswer: Method belongs to the class, not instances

title: Add Two Numbers
description: Write a Python function to add two numbers.

codeTask.prompt:
Create a function `add(a, b)` that returns the sum of `a` and `b`.
Example Input: `add(10, 5)`
Expected Output: `15`

title: Filter Even Numbers
description: Write a function to filter even numbers from an array.

codeTask.prompt:
Write a function `filterEvens(arr)` that returns only even numbers from the input array.
Example Input: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
Expected Output: [2, 4, 6]

title: Palindrome Checker
description: Write a method to check if a string is a palindrome.

codeTask.prompt:
Implement a method `isPalindrome(String s)` that returns true if the string is a palindrome.
Example Input: `"racecar"`
Expected Output: `true`
